titles.title: To modify the appointment and removal process for certain legislative branch officers, and for other purposes.
To modify the appointment and removal process for certain legislative branch officers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
